gotchas: Do NOT use GUI libs (PySide6) in Serverless environment - causes 500 crash.
Python Dicts with integer keys are serialized to JSON as { '1': ... }, causing KeyErrors if accessed as int in Python client re-ingestion.
Frontend must handle Python Lists vs Dicts carefully (Object.values vs Array.map).
